resources.string: CoE-Docket is a platform meant exclusively for the students of CDAC Center of Excellence,CVRCE.The application allows to submit assignments from anywhere inside college campus within the allowed time domain. Students can download study material for different modules.Also it gives provision to view attendance,result,schedule for different modules as when updated by the admin.
A tech-savyy teacher,mentor,coordinator,a true guide and what not!His vision has been instrumental in the completion of CoE-Docket.
An inquisitive tech-geek.CoE-Docket is an upshot of his pre-eminent endeavour.
